<!-- Please do not edit this file, it is generated. -->
# tfe_agent_pool_allowed_projects

Adds and removes allowed projects on an agent pool.

~> **NOTE:** This resource requires using the provider with HCP Terraform and a HCP Terraform
for Business account.
[Learn more about HCP Terraform pricing here](https://www.hashicorp.com/products/terraform/pricing).

## Example Usage

```typescript
import * as constructs from "constructs";
import * as cdktf from "cdktf";
/*Provider bindings are generated by running cdktf get.
See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.*/
import * as tfe from "./.gen/providers/tfe";
class MyConvertedCode extends cdktf.TerraformStack {
  constructor(scope: constructs.Construct, name: string) {
    super(scope, name);
    const tfeOrganizationTestOrganization = new tfe.organization.Organization(
      this,
      "test-organization",
      {
        email: "admin@company.com",
        name: "my-org-name",
      }
    );
    const tfeProjectTestProject = new tfe.project.Project(
      this,
      "test-project",
      {
        name: "my-project-name",
        organization: cdktf.Token.asString(
          tfeOrganizationTestOrganization.name
        ),
      }
    );
    const tfeAgentPoolTestAgentPool = new tfe.agentPool.AgentPool(
      this,
      "test-agent-pool",
      {
        name: "my-agent-pool-name",
        organization: cdktf.Token.asString(
          tfeOrganizationTestOrganization.name
        ),
        organizationScoped: false,
      }
    );
    new tfe.agentPoolAllowedProjects.AgentPoolAllowedProjects(this, "allowed", {
      agentPoolId: cdktf.Token.asString(tfeAgentPoolTestAgentPool.id),
      allowedProjectIds: [cdktf.Token.asString(tfeProjectTestProject.id)],
    });
  }
}

```

## Argument Reference

The following arguments are supported:

* `agentPoolId` - (Required) The ID of the agent pool.
* `allowedProjectIds` - (Required) IDs of projects to be added as allowed projects on the agent pool.


## Import

A resource can be imported; use `<AGENT POOL ID>` as the import ID. For example:

```shell
terraform import tfe_agent_pool_allowed_projects.foobar apool-rW0KoLSlnuNb5adB
```
